#NEPAModernization will finally provide regulatory relief for our rural communities in #WA04, across the West, and beyond.

https://t.co/goFKA4q36X

1283841788889923584.text: “Farmers and ranchers rely on the land, some directly on federal forests and rangelands, so keeping them healthy and productive is critical to us....Updating these 40-year-old regulations is smart government.” - @FarmBureau #NEPAModernization

1283841787942117376.text: “Endless delays, limited transparency & agency ambiguity far too often prevent...our hard working members & the public from realizing the benefits of impactful investments in all manner of projects. Common sense reforms and interagency accountability are long overdue.” - @NABTU

1283841787107389444.text: "A smarter NEPA foundation means that many energy and infrastructure projects have the certainty and clarity to finally move forward under the same high level of safety and environmental stewardship Americans demand." - @oceanindustries #NEPAModernization

1283841786289561606.text: "Infrastructure investment is a surefire way to reduce our nation’s environmental impact & this action by Pres. Trump will help accelerate construction projects that reduce waste & result in a more efficient...transportation system." - @TRUCKINGdotORG #NEPAModernization

1283841785400360960.text: "@whceq's bold steps today utilize existing authority to strengthen reviews, reduce the time necessary to obtain permits and set the stage to incentivize job creation and investment in America." - @ShopFloorNAM #NEPAModernization

1283841784557318144.text: "Regulatory hurdles under NEPA have triggered reliability challenges and forced electric co-ops and their communities to endure costly projects delays. We support the spirit of NEPA and these sensible modernizations are long overdue." - @NRECANews #NEPAModernization

1283841783697485824.text: "Once enacted, this rule will remove unnecessary red tape and allow taxpayer dollars to be used to develop much needed infrastructure that sustains high-paying jobs, improves our communities and advance environmental stewardship." - @NSSGA #NEPAModernization

1283841782871138304.text: "NEPA has not been updated in 40 years and TFI has been supportive of these long overdue changes that improve efficiency of the permitting process and ensure continued environmental protection." - @Fertilizer_Inst #NEPAModernization

1283841782023954437.text: "These changes make NEPA analysis more timely & targeted. No more 'analysis by paralysis' that has hampered our economy & natural resource management for years!" -@PLCranching #NEPAModernization

1283841781143142400.text: "In this time of economic hardship, America must be able to put people to work to rebuild our aging transportation infrastructure like highways, bridges, and airports." - @USChamber @unlock_invest #NEPAModernization

1283841780186845185.text: "This updated review process will make it easier to rebuild aging infrastructure, attract private investment, support efforts to reintegrate our economy and continue to provide strict protections for the environment." - @AGCofA #NEPAModernization

1283841779347980288.text: "A reformed permitting process will enable natural gas utilities to continue to deliver affordable and clean natural gas which will be essential for our nation's economic revival and achieving our shared environmental goals." - @aga_naturalgas #NEPAModernization

1283841778475507712.text: "Bringing NEPA into the 21st Century will speed up the permitting for infrastructure and will allow Americans to have access to safer roads sooner as the latest roadway safety features are likely to be included in new or updated projects." - @highwayusers #NEPAModernization

1283841777624133632.text: "Now, more than ever, Americans need #jobs and our communities need infrastructure investment. These updates will unlock opportunities that will fuel our economic recovery." - @APGA #NEPAModernization

1283841776776810498.text: "Today's action is essential to U.S. energy leadership and environmental progress, providing more certainty to jumpstart not only the modernized pipeline infrastructure we need to deliver cleaner fuels but highways, bridges, and renewable energy." - @APIenergy #NEPAModernization

1283841775594024961.text: "The final rule will speed up the approval process for much-needed infrastructure projects, which will especially benefit the rural communities in which ag retailers and the customers live and work." - @DarenCoppock @AgRetailers #NEPAModernization

1283841774679719938.text: #NEPAModernization is a step in the right direction as we expedite the approval process & simultaneously encourage environmental stewardship. 1222305780151603201.text: Members of the @westerncaucus from across the nation are united in our message: We must #ModernizeESA. Strengthening this bedrock conservation law is good for species, communities, science, taxpayers, and our economy.

1222305779128119297.text: @RepJasonSmith @RepTipton @RepGosar @westerncaucus @RepLaMalfa @RepPeteOlson @RepAndyBiggsAZ @RepRalphNorman @replouiegohmert Our legislative package has gained the support of dozens of organizations like the National ESA Reform Coalition, @USChamber, @NAHBhome, @NRECANews, @WesternEnergy1, @NACoTweets, Family Farm Alliance, @Women4Ag, @AGCofA, @NCottonCouncil, @NationalMining, @IPAAaccess & more.

1222304571441274881.text: @RepJasonSmith @RepTipton @RepGosar @westerncaucus @RepLaMalfa @RepPeteOlson @RepAndyBiggsAZ @RepRalphNorman We should be empowering states & local governments to increase species recovery – not tying their hands. @replouiegohmert’s SAVES Act is a step toward enhancing diverse species populations. #ModernizeESA

1222302270852870144.text: @RepJasonSmith @RepTipton @RepGosar @westerncaucus @RepLaMalfa @RepPeteOlson @RepAndyBiggsAZ The outdated ESA currently allows the government to infringe on the private property rights of American land owners. @RepRalphNorman’s Property Rights Protection Act would #ModernizeESA by giving fair & equitable treatment to property owners.

1222301644626571264.text: @RepJasonSmith @RepTipton @RepGosar @westerncaucus @RepLaMalfa @RepPeteOlson Under the current ESA, the U.S. is using taxpayer dollars in foreign countries, where we often can’t enforce our stringent conservation laws. @RepAndyBiggsAZ’s #HR5638 would focus our resources on protecting & revitalizing species in the U.S. #ModernizeESA

1222300454400462850.text: @RepJasonSmith @RepTipton @RepGosar @westerncaucus @RepLaMalfa ESA listing decisions can have huge impacts on local economies. @RepPeteOlson’s Listing Reform Act will allow for economic effects of an ESA listing to be analyzed and reported. #ModernizeESA

1222297649816178689.text: @RepJasonSmith @RepTipton @RepGosar @westerncaucus My friend and colleague @RepLaMalfa has been a leader in the efforts to #ModernizeESA. He understands the importance of maintaining critical infrastructure like levies and dams in rural communities while maintaining protections for ESA-listed species.

1222295143111438338.text: @RepJasonSmith @RepTipton .@RepGosar serves as Chairman of the @westerncaucus, leading the effort to #ModernizeESA and bring the law into the 21st Century. His bill would make important changes to the ESA to help us better achieve the intent of the law: successful species recovery.

1222294149174648833.text: @RepJasonSmith The ultimate goal of the ESA should be to keep species off the list. By encouraging voluntary species conservation & investment at the local level through legislation like @RepTipton’s LOCAL Act, we can improve and #ModernizeESA.

1222292491761745922.text: .@RepJasonSmith is working hard to #ModernizeESA by proposing the EMPOWERS Act, giving state and local governments greater power & involvement with regard to ESA petitions and listing decisions.

1222291540548243456.text: In order to be most effective, we must keep the ESA updated with accurate data. Rep. Gianforte's LIST Act will #ModernizeESA by requiring that species be delisted when objective, accurate scientific information finds that a species is recovered.

1222289805398151170.text: I introduced #HR5588 the WHOLE Act to ensure ALL conservation efforts are considered when federal decisions impacting ESA-listed species are being made. Instead of a top-down approach, we should be promoting the comprehensive efforts of states, local communities, and tribes.

1222289804706091013.text: The @westerncaucus legislative package will #ModernizeESA based on sound science – not politics.

1222289803875704834.text: The ESA was signed into law with a worthy goal: protect & revitalize endangered or threatened animals & wildlife. Unfortunately, the outdated ESA has been manipulated as a political spearhead – threatening private property rights, public land use, local communities, and jobs.

1222289801514299393.text: HAPPENING NOW: I am leading my @westerncaucus colleagues in a Special Order to discuss our efforts to strengthen & modernize the Endangered Species Act. The ESA has not been updated in 47 years & has a dismal 3% success rate. It is time to #ModernizeESA! https://t.co/GBM8AIVaqb

1184596169504235520.text: On behalf of the Native communities, families, and loved ones in #WA04, I know we must take action. Savanna's Act and the BADGES for Native Communities Act would provide immediate relief to tribal communities & law enforcement who face this crisis every day.

1184596168556384257.text: @RepDustyJohnson (R-SD): "In just the last few years, we have had 6000 Native American women go missing...and just a handful of those cases have been logged with the Dept. of Justice. 1100200685516271616.text: Tonight, I look forward to hearing from my friends and colleagues in the Congressional @WesternCaucus on why the #GreenNewDeal would be catastrophic for their constituents and what we should really be prioritizing in order to continue America’s energy independence dominance. https://t.co/fgP7MRmmhx

1100200572672712705.text: Not once is the word “hydropower” mentioned in the legislation, and the “Frequently Asked Questions” document released to accompany the introduction of the #GreenNewDeal stated that “the plan is to transition off of nuclear…”

1100200451516125185.text: It also comes from our use of nuclear power. The Columbia Generating Station, which is also in the 4th Congressional District I represent, is the only nuclear power plant in the greater Northwest region. It, too, provides clean, reliable power for the Pacific Northwest.

1100200363217600512.text: Nearly 70% of WA's power comes from hydropower, a clean, renewable, reliable, and affordable source of baseload energy.

1100200050704203778.text: The great State of Washington consistently ranks at the top of the list of states with the cleanest energy production--Because of strong reliance on our incredible system of hydroelectric dams, many of which are in my Congressional District along the Columbia and Snake Rivers.

1100199298803863552.text: By expanding our federal bureaucracy far beyond anything we have ever seen in history and undermining the federalist principles our country was founded upon in the Constitution, the #GreenNewDeal would jeopardize the future of America as we know it. https://t.co/UMjYqOwsq2

1100199038085971968.text: This so-called “deal” calls for cutting greenhouse-gas emissions to net zero in only 10 years—one independent estimate led by a team of Stanford engineers suggests it would cost our nation at least $7 trillion to convert all of America’s power to renewable power. https://t.co/hqGwX5g8n7
